sentences.sContent: The state of Nevada is largely desert.
sentences.sCn: 内华达州大部分是沙漠。

sentences.sContent: It had been a tiring day, largely because of all the tedious waiting.
sentences.sCn: 那一天真累人，主要是因为等得无聊。

sentences.sContent: ...learning cost will be so largely decreased that people can afford to apply for more courses they are interested in...
...largely polar scientists in fields like glaciology and meteorology...
...but it was largely destroyed by a fire that killed two members of the navy in 2012...
...that advantage goes largely to students who already have numerous advantages...
...it would add significant cost and complexity to an emerging industry that has until now operated largely as the playground of billionaires and dreamy engineers...
...while talking is largely subconscious and rapid...
...Sweden's rank in the report can largely be explained by its political quota system...
...or for a worker to move up from assembler to machinist to supervisor - went largely unnoticed...
...largely because of new rules that curb the issuer's ability to charge fees or raise certain interest rates at will...
